400,-50,50,900,800,0;;;
50,-50,550,900,700,-1;;;
220,-50,190,440,30,-1;  190,440,170,420,5,-1;  170,420,150,420,5,-1;  150,420,130,400,5,-1;  130,420,130,400,5,0;  130,400,150,380,5,1;  150,380,300,360,20,1; 300,360,530,360,20,1;;;
-100,50,250,900,600,1;;;
-50,200,260,250,30,1;  260,250,120,300,50,-1;  120,300,260,350,40,1;  260,350,330,340,20,1;  330,340,600,300,30,1;;;
-50,150,200,200,30,1;  200,200,220,220,5,1;  220,220,200,240,5,-1;  200,240,180,240,5,-1;  180,240,160,220,5,-1;  160,220,180,200,5,1;  180,200,200,200,5,1;  200,200,220,220,5,1;  220,220,200,240,5,-1;  200,240,100,260,15,-1;  100,260,-50,260,15,-1;;;
530,400,280,350,30,-1;  280,350,260,330,5,-1;  260,330,280,310,5,1;  280,310,300,310,5,1;  300,310,320,330,5,1;  320,330,300,350,5,-1;  300,350,280,350,5,-1;  280,350,260,330,5,-1;  260,330,280,310,5,1;  280,310,330,290,15,1;  330,290,510,290,15,1;;;
400,-50,50,900,600,0;;;
50,-50,550,900,500,-1;;;
-100,50,250,900,400,1;;;
50,0,150,200,30,1;  150,200,80,250,20,-1;  80,200,200,250,20,1;  200,250,100,300,20,-1;  100,300,180,350,20,1;  180,350,-80,400,30,-1;;;





//  <-- Trennzeichen für den Code

Weg der Gegner
x_start, y_start, x_end, y_end, Frames, ModelArt [-1 = left] [0 = normal] [1 = right]

Es wird immer der komplette Weg in ein Listenelement geladen und dann komplett abgefragt
